snippet: Tsonga, ranked 12th, struggled with the injury during France’s loss to Switzerland in the Davis Cup final in November.
abstract: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga pulls out of Australian Open due to injury to his right forearm.
lead_paragraph: Tsonga, ranked 12th, struggled with the injury during France’s loss to Switzerland in the Davis Cup final in November.

headline.main: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga Will Skip Australian Open With Arm Injury
headline.print_headline: Tsonga Will Skip Australian Open With Arm Injury
